title: Doc Coyle from God Forbid & Bad Wolves
itunes:title: Doc Coyle from God Forbid & Bad Wolves
description:
Today we get to know Doc Coyle, the guitarist from God Forbid, a bit better. I speak to him about race, longevity and the motivation to create art regardless of your surroundings. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
